short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts pixel (px) to rem and vice versa

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly & Easily Convert Pixels to REM & REM to Pixels with our extension.

Features:

- Conversions happen automatically as you type or change the values in the input box. No time wasted pressing convert button!

- Our extension can do reverse conversions as well. That is REM to PX. Just enter the value in the REM box and converted px value will be displayed in the Pixels box.

- Moreover changeable base (root html) size makes it a complete package.
